settings.title: Nuclea Mega Menu
settings.html:
|
Fale com um Especialista

settings.title: Nuclea Menu CSS
settings.html:
<style>
/* NUCLEA MEGA MENU - ESTILOS */
:root {
  --nuclea-primary: #BA82FF;
  --nuclea-primary-dark: #8311DA;
  --nuclea-accent: #66FFCC;
  --nuclea-hover-bg: #EFD3FF;
  --nuclea-border: #E3E3E3;
}

.nuclea-mega-menu-wrapper {
  position: relative;
  font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, sans-serif;
}

.menu-item-button:hover,
.menu-item-button.active {
  color: var(--nuclea-primary) !important;
}

.lang-button:hover {
  color: #66FFCC !important;
}

.nuclea-search-button:hover {
  color: var(--nuclea-primary) !important;
}

.nuclea-menu-column {
  width: 282px;
  flex-shrink: 0;
  background-color: #fff;
  border: 1px solid var(--nuclea-border);
  box-shadow: 3px 0px 4px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.16);
}

.nuclea-menu-item {
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: background-color 0.2s;
}

.nuclea-menu-item:hover:not(.active) {
  background-color: #f9fafb;
}

.nuclea-menu-item.active {
  background-color: var(--nuclea-hover-bg);
}

.nuclea-menu-item .item-text {
  transition: color 0.2s;
}

.nuclea-menu-item:hover .item-text,
.nuclea-menu-item.active .item-text {
  color: var(--nuclea-primary-dark);
}

.nuclea-menu-item .item-icon {
  transition: opacity 0.2s, color 0.2s;
}

.nuclea-menu-item:hover .item-icon,
.nuclea-menu-item.active .item-icon {
  opacity: 1;
  color: var(--nuclea-primary-dark);
}

.footer-link:hover {
  color: var(--nuclea-primary-dark) !important;
}

@keyframes fadeIn {
  from {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: translateY(-10px);
  }
  to {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translateY(0);
  }
}

#nuclea-mega-menu-dropdown.show {
  animation: fadeIn 0.2s ease-out;
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .nuclea-mega-menu-wrapper {
    display: none;
  }
}
</style>
